jam
Class JamMain

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      jam.JamMain
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, AcquisitionStatus, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.util.Observer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class JamMain
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements AcquisitionStatus, java.util.Observer

Main Class for Jam. This class makes the pull down menu and It is implemented by Jam.

Since:
JDK1.1
Version:
0.5 April 98
Author:
Ken Swartz
See Also:
Serialized Form

setSortMode

public void setSortMode(int mode)
                 throws JamException
Determines the mode for sorting data Enables and disables JMenu items as appropriate. Gives the window a title for the sort Mode.

Parameters:
mode - the new mode for Jam to be in
Throws:
JamException - sends a message to the console if there is an inappropriate call
See Also:
ONLINE_DISK, ONLINE_TAPE, OFFLINE_DISK, OFFLINE_TAPE, FILE, REMOTE, NO_SORT

setSortModeFile

public void setSortModeFile(java.lang.String fileName)
                     throws JamException
Set the jam to be in sort mode file and gives it the file Name.

Parameters:
fileName - the file to be sorted?
Throws:
JamException - sends a message to the console if there is a problem

isOnLine in interface AcquisitionStatus

setRunState

public void setRunState(int rs,
                        int runNumber)

Sets run state when taking data online. The run state mostly determints the state of control JMenu items. This method uses imformation set by setSortMode(). In addition:

  • Control JMenu items are enabled and disabled as appropriate.
  • Control JMenu items are states are set and unset as appropriate.
  • The JMenu bar is to show online sort.
  • Updates display status label .

Parameters:
rs - see the options for this just below
runNumber - serial number assigned the run in the run control dialog box
See Also:
NO_ACQ, ACQ_OFF, ACQ_ON, RUN_OFF, RUN_ON

setRunState

public void setRunState(int rs)
Sets the run state with out the run number specified see setRunState(int runState, int runNumber)

Parameters:
rs - one of six possible modes
See Also:
getRunState()

public int getRunState()
